tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (JJS best) (NN way)) (SBAR (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB spread) (NP (NNP Christmas) (NN cheer))))))) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBG singing) (ADVP (JJ loud) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT all)))) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB hear)))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [singing/VBG nsubj>[way/NN det>The/DT amod>best/JJS acl>[spread/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[cheer/NN compound>Christmas/NNP]]] aux>is/VBZ advmod>[loud/JJ nmod:for>[all/DT case>for/IN]] xcomp>[hear/VB mark>to/TO] punct>!/.]
[makes/VBZ nsubj>[@Kelch2007/NN compound>#Christmasmovie/NN] nsubj>it/PRP ccomp>[miss/VB nsubj>me/PRP dobj>you/PRP] punct>!/.]
